title: WHO calls for global pause on COVID-19 vaccine boosters
content:
1. WHO calls for global pause on COVID-19 vaccine boosters  Global News
  2. WHO calls for a moratorium on booster shots until at least the end of September  CNN
  3. WHO Calls for Halt to Covid-19 Booster Shots  The Wall Street Journal
  4. COVID-19 booster shots: Why wait?  The Boston Globe
  5. WHO calls for halting COVID-19 vaccine boosters in favor of unvaccinated  Reuters
